message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.IT. 

The paper discusses the comparison of a connectionist model with the optimal Bayesian decision rule for a fault detection problem, which suggests that it falls under the category of neural networks (cs.NE) and machine learning (cs.LG). The use of the perceptron learning algorithm and the pocket algorithm also indicates that it may belong to the subfield of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The problem of fault detection is related to control systems (cs.SY) and information theory (cs.IT), which are also possible sub-categories.
